reviewText: This film is actually very good.  Dania Ramirez is great to see since she was in X-Men.  The story-line is good, the characters are well developed and the acting is top-notch.
Title: Illegal Tender

reviewText: Okay the little boy in this movie is a great actor. The Mama is hot for her age (and I'm a gal.) The guy needed help- serioulsy- but this is all besides the point. This movie was a pretty good movie in exception to the horrible representation of Puerto Ricans- every ethnicity/race has segments in the drug market but the idea that a supposedly educated and intelligent woman would make references- I wish I could quote but I can't-however comments regarding success and how there are stains in the background of everyone who achieves it, comments that say that this money is deserved and well earned because his father earned it selling drugs and that they got this life because of, in a sense, his fathers good character- a good person who cared for them and wanted the best for them and thats why he sold drugs. WTH! The statements on their own are bad enough but the fact that the - ***spoiler here***- father cheated on her and got another girl pregnant (she doesn't know this) further invalidates this claim. The movie would have been great if the mothers character was sensible- but she is supposedly educated yet she has this mentality that is found in the ghetto and that is far from a middle class value- and its not because she came from the ghetto because growing up in one not only was I raised with middle class values but I knew plenty of people who were too. Its sort of like the idea of White Trash- there are (plenty I am sure) poorer Whites with these middle class values who some still consider to be White Trash (because of their social conditions) but then there are those who deviate not only from the majorities class status but also from their ideals. Point being the mom had what I and my friends call "the ghetto mentality" and this mentality is by far not a trademark of everyone in this segment- tisk tisk. Thank god that a John Singleton made this movie because if a Puerto Rican had made it I would be ashamed. My main comment I guess would be that if people with deviant ideals annoy you then this film will also. The characters in the film aren't "ghetto" by the way its just the moms thought process regarding what is and isn't justifiable to achieve success. As for those of you who expect a movie like Scarface this is far from it- Scarface is way violent and has an in depth view of the "drug world," characteristics not in this movie.
summary: Film has too much of that "ghetto mentality"
Title: Illegal Tender

reviewText: The movie was actin filled from begining to end. Rick Gonzalez is a good actor, as well as the lovely Wanda De Jesus...the story came together really well, but I should have expected it comming from the most underrated director in Hoolywood ( John Singleton)....deff if you like good actors a great story and an excellent movie....this is it. If I could give 10 stars I would
summary: The sexy Wanda De Jesus, and Rick Gonzalez: In one the best movies of 2007

reviewText: Great DVD.  Full of action and suspense.  I've been meaning to watch this since it was in the theater a few years ago.  I was surprised to find it for under $5.00 on Amazon.  I couldn't lose at that price.
Title: Illegal Tender

reviewText: This is one of those movies that makes you wonder why you wasted 2hrs watching it. The acting is horrible, the storyline is beyond ridiculous, and I felt nothing for any of the characters. I won't give the ending away but when you finally find out why the PR mafia is after this woman and her kids you'll want your money back. I saw it for free and I feel that I was ripped off. On the plus side, the women in the movie are hot so its not a total waste but really I can't believe this was actually in theatres.
Title: Illegal Tender

Title: Illegal Tender

reviewerName: HE WHO FUNKS BEHIND THE ROWS!!
reviewText: "Illegal Tender" is a very well put together, written, directedand acted movie!---Point Blank!!--Period!!It is about family coming together, it's about protecting the ones you hold dear, it's about the the young-headzrespecting the struggles of the ones who came before them,all wrapped within this urban gangster thriller from amodern latino perspective.  ----I LOVE THIS FILM!!----Wanda DeJesus, Rick Gonzalez, Manny Perez, Tego Caulderon allpull it off with gusto and made me believe it and getinto the characters 100%!!Rick Gonzalez is one to watch y'all!!--The man's goingplaces, and he isn't bad on the eyes either!All-n-All, money well spent and I would recommend this DVDto anyone who likes good action and drama.--Buy It!!
summary: Great Action & Suspense!!--More Than Just Another Gangster Thriller!!
Title: Illegal Tender

Title: Illegal Tender

reviewText: The plot of the story is totally realistic.  A mother will do what she has to do to protect her children (at all cost).  Although at times the acting took a nose dive and the realism would dip (the shoot out in the middle of the day?), I enjoyed this movie.  Rick Gonzalez did an excellent job with the material.  I purchased Illegal Tender based soley on the fact that it was produced by John Singleton.  Happy to say, I don't regret buying it.I recommend this movie to others.
Title: Illegal Tender

reviewText: I have to agree that whoever liked this film either has a stake in it or knows very little about movies. Other than the fact that Wanda was REALLY hot, it was honestly ridiculous. The acting was terrible, the plot waa hole-ridden, and it made no sense whatever. If I were Hispanic, I'd be ashamed of this thing.

reviewText: The positive reviews must be from people involved with this film and who might profit.One of the worst films ever...does not make any sense at all.Comparing this to Scarface....please. Scarface is a msterpiece compared to this. I am not saying Scarface is a masterpiece.Terrible acting. The little boy in the film is by far the best actor of the bunch.The young girl in the film is plain irritating. I wish she had been offed.Dialogue is just terrible.....Don't waste your time or money on this 'Redemption' flick.
Title: Illegal Tender
